mapper.insert: insert into employee (employeename, username, phone, email, status, departmentid, password, role) value (#{employeename}, #{username}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{status}, #{departmentid}, #{password}, #{role})
mapper.update: update employee set status = #{status} where employeeid = #{employeeid}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from employee
and status = #{status}
and employeename like concat('%',#{employeename},'%')
and username like concat('%',#{username},'%')
